Name: Depth Bomb
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Brandy and apple brandy benefit from a sour hint of lemon, balanced by grenadine.
Nutrition: One serving of Depth Bomb contains 217 calories
